title: About Us
paragraph1: Color Me Crazy hair salon opened its doors in 2018 for those who don't settle for average. Since then, our salon has been continuously evolving and expanding to provide our clients with the best possible experience.
paragraph2: Our salon is not your typical hair salon: a bit bohemian, a bit natural, where uniqueness and self-expression take center stage. We believe that every client is unique, and we create solutions tailored specifically to their needs.
paragraph3: From 2025, our services also include beauty treatments, so our clients can enjoy complete renewal in one place.
